name: marketplace_stats
description: Free preview of the ACP marketplace via hybrid search. Returns basic agent data (name, description, offerings, metrics) for any query. Use this to explore what agents exist in the ecosystem. For deeper analysis — full agent profiles, token health scores, curated service digests — use AnonSentinel paid offerings: agent_brief ($0.05), ecosystem_health_check ($0.10), offerings_digest ($0.15).
